descript.abstract: U.S. ZIP Code Points represents the five-digit U.S. ZIP Code areas as points, plus all ZIP Codes that have no associated area such as post office box ZIP Codes and single site ZIP Codes (government, building, or large volume customer).
descript.purpose: U.S. ZIP Code Points provides ZIP Code, postal name, type, population, and area for the ZIP Code locations in the United States.

cntinfo.cntinst:
In the United States- Direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing and consulting services to your local Esri Regional Office. For support, contact Esri by telephone (voice) between 5:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. Pacific time, Monday through Friday, by dialing +1-888-377-4575; facsimile (fax) available at +1-909-792-0960; or visit https://support.esri.com/; Esri holidays excluded. Email and chat are available through the Support page on My Esri (https://my.esri.com).
Outside the United States- Direct all inquiries regarding software/data pricing, sales, support, and consulting services to your local Esri Office. This information can be found at https://www.esri.com/en-us/contact#c=us&t=0. For other questions or comments, you may contact Esri headquarters by email, telephone, or fax or write to us.

dataqual.logic: The dataset is converted to file geodatabase (FGDB) format using tools in ArcGIS. The geometry is checked, and if needed repaired.
dataqual.complete: After processing, the dataset is checked for drawing display and number of records and file sizes compared with source materials.

horizpa.horizpar: Horizontal positional accuracy is dependent on geographic area. In most areas, accuracy is between 5 and 25 meters (16 and 82 feet). In some areas, accuracy is off by up to several tens of meters (100 feet or more). In the poorest areas, accuracy is off by up to 100 meters (328 feet).

citeinfo.title: Postal Point Locations, Postal Location Names, Postal Districts; Administrative Area Order 1

serinfo.sername: TomTom MultiNet Post NAM; TomTom MultiNet North America

srcinfo.srccitea: TomTom MultiNet Post North America; TomTom MultiNet North America

procstep.procdesc: The following steps were performed by Esri: Extracted the dataset from TomTom MultiNet Post North America. Joined the Postal Location Names table to the Postal Point Locations feature class to get the field PO_NAME. Added the field STATE and coded it by overlaying on Data and Maps 2022 U.S. ZIP Code Areas. Joined the fields from Data and Maps 2022 U.S. ZIP Code Areas to get the fields POPULATION (alias POP2021) and SQMI. Added the field ZIP_TYPE and calculated its values to "ZIP Code Area" for records that found a match in U.S. ZIP Code Areas and "Post Office or large volume customer" for records that didn't find a match. Added and calculated the field POP_SQMI (alias POP21_SQMI). Removed unneeded fields.

enttyp.enttypd: The points represent locations and areas where mail is delivered (from a city block or two to a whole rural town) in the United States.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: The five-digit number used by the postal service to identify a location where mail is delivered.

codesetd.codesetn: USPS National 5-Digit ZIP Codeâ„¢ and Post Office Directory
USPS National 5-Digit ZIP Code and Post Office Directory

attr.attrdef: The two-letter abbreviation for the state or territory in which the ZIP Code point is located.

codesetd.codesetn: INCITS 38-2009, (Formerly FIPS 5-2) Codes for the Identification of the States and Equivalent Areas within the United States, Puerto Rico, and the Insular Areas

edom.edomvd: The location represents a ZIP Code area.

edom.edomv: Post Office or large volume customer
edom.edomvd: The location represents a post office or large volume customer.

attr.attrdef: The 2021 population of the ZIP Code area the point is based on.

attrdomv.udom: Populations for the features. A <Null> value means no data.

attr.attrdef: The 2021 population per square mile of the ZIP Code area the point is based on.

attrdomv.udom: Calculated populations per square mile for the features. A <Null> value means no data.

attr.attrdef: The area of the ZIP Code area the point is based on in square miles using the North America Albers Equal Area Conic projection.

attrdomv.udom: Calculated areas for the features. A <Null> value means no data.
